attributes.action: Save Our PRIORY URBAN GREEN SPACE (PUGS)
attributes.additional_details: Camden Council wish develop a small patch of nautal ground which has been forgotten about over the years. Mother Nature stepped in and has set up a thriving community of urtban fauna and insects. These little guys are fighting for survival in a tough environment. They are helped along by the local community, who are tired the gradual stripping oF greenspaces from our environment. Camden council wish to develop the small site in to parking bays. We disagree. We need your vote to save this little island from being swallowed up in a sea of concrete.
